scripts.build:backoffice: cd backoffice && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:widget: cd widget && npm install && npm run build
scripts.netlify:deploy: npm run build:backoffice && npm run build:widget && node scripts/deploy-netlify.js
scripts.netlify:backoffice: cd backoffice && npm install && npm run build && netlify deploy --dir=dist --prod --site=989ed12a-f968-4f13-93bd-64c2bdad412d
scripts.netlify:widget: cd widget && npm install && npm run build && netlify deploy --dir=dist --prod --site=edd136c6-1000-4c64-a6fe-848d09335fe6
